pr_title: Renamed DeleteSnapshotsOptionType to ShareSnapshotsDeleteOptionType for Share Delete API

timeline.message: Renamed Delete snapshot options for Share

timeline.bodyText: Oh I probably need to update the changlog in .NET, too.
timeline.author: seanmcc-msft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4,6 +4,7 @@
 - Added support to specify whether or not a pipeline policy should be added per call or per retry.
 - Added support for setting access tier on a share through ShareClient.create, ShareClient.setAccessTier.
 - Added support for getting access tier on a share through ShareClient.getProperties, ShareServiceClient.listShares
+- Renamed DeleteSnapshotsOptionType to ShareSnapshotsDeleteOption in ShareClient.delete

timeline.message: Added type to end of enum name

timeline.bodyText: May be able to do this renaming using a Swagger transform. Change looks good otherwise.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+// Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
+// Licensed under the MIT License.
+
+package com.azure.storage.file.share.models;
+
+/**
+ * Defines values for ShareSnapshotsDeleteOptionType.
+ */
+public enum ShareSnapshotsDeleteOptionType {

replies.bodyText:
Mind seeing what this does:
directive:
- from: swagger-document
  where: $.parameters.DeleteSnapshots["x-ms-enum"]
  transform: >
    $.name = "ShareSnapshotsDeleteOptionType";
replies.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: Reason we didn't do that in .NET and I believe here is that generator doesn't give us opportunity to add better verbose doc strings for enum members.
replies.author: kasobol-msft
